letters.description: Deeply understand the client's unique breastfeeding journey, challenges, goals, and emotional landscape through active listening and comprehensive inquiry.
Evaluate current feeding dynamics, physical factors, infant cues, and maternal well-being to identify root causes of difficulties and opportunities for improvement.
Develop personalized strategies and educate the client on evidence-based techniques, physiology, and problem-solving skills specific to their needs and aspirations.
Guide the client through implementing new practices, provide practical support, and confirm understanding and progress, adjusting as needed for optimal results.
Empower the client to achieve a sustainable, confident, and joyful breastfeeding experience, fostering long-term success and well-being for both parent and baby.
